name: AShooter
description:
Inspired by Space Impact, a space shooter from the old Nokia 3310 and other space shooters made for old phones, I created this game. I remember having so much fun playing those space shooters, despite their simplicity, so I tried to made something that resemble those aesthetics ^^'

However, the game is not pixel perfect. I tried to make the game more "fluid" and a just a little bit modern for high resolutions.

The game itself has very little story. You just must destroy the alien invasion with your spaceship and grant Earth with momentary peace.

There are 6 different stages with unique challenges and besides the default spaceship shot, there are more 3 sub-weapons that you can use.

That's it! 

I hope you enjoy my first game :3
